input: How to set up Razorpay for UPI payments?
output:
To set up Razorpay for UPI payments in FY 2025-26:
1. Sign up on razorpay.com with business PAN and bank details.
2. Complete KYC (upload GSTIN, Aadhaar, etc.).
3. Enable UPI in Razorpay Dashboard > Payment Methods.
4. Generate a dynamic QR code or UPI ID (e.g., business@razorpay).
5. Integrate via API or plugins (e.g., WooCommerce) for e-commerce.
6. Settle funds daily to your bank account (fees: ~0.4%).
InvoNest integrates Razorpay for seamless payments. Need API integration help?
